attributes.action: Ban all political parties from using analytics to place untraceable ads online
attributes.background: This is a petition to amend electoral law to ban all UK political parties from using analytics firms to display individually-tailored untraceable ads online during electoral campaigns and future referenda. The ban should cover all social media platforms to avoid a repeat of Cambridge Analytica.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258124
